note.text: Alabama has won nine straight season openers, dating back to
the 1990 season...Bama's 15th straight win over Vandy...UA
played 26 first-time players today...The Tide started two
true freshmen (Rasheed/Ellington), a first in school history

play.tokens: CMT:VU wons toss and defers. UA receives and defends north goal.
